website_summaries.verdict: It's not the meatiest offering that Nintendo games usually offer, but Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker is totally accessible and undeniably fun to play. The games ends a little sooner than we expected and a few control scheme decisions have us wishing for more customization.
pros: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker offers a healthy amount of puzzle based platforming with a unique control scheme baked in
The game features tons of Nintendo references and music that serve as a great throwback
cons: The GamePad's motion control scheme is frustrating and can't be turned off and the standard level camera is too far away (thankfully you can zoom in)
The game is also shorter than most Nintendo offerings

customer_reviews.title: A fun and entertaining experience!
customer_reviews.text: If you own a Wii U, then pick up this game. It's really fun to play. Depending on your skill level, it may or may not be that challenging. The graphics are excellent and each challenge varies in difficulty. Toad is also a cute character in the world of Nintendo, so you may get a few laughs from this character as well.
customer_reviews.author: Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: The Best Puzzle Game of Our Time
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliantly executed puzzle game. A true 3D platformer. Navigate through multi level 3D worlds with the ever dedicated Toad. What he lacks in expeditiousness he makes up in sheer pluck. No jumping here! You will need to figure out how to kill enemies and change levels all without the usual help of jumping. Choose between a first person view and a third person view. Use the game pad to twist, turn, flip, move and explore levels. If you liked the Toad levels from Super Mario 3D World, you'll love this game.
customer_reviews.author: genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game with great replay value. The game is just the right amount of difficulty. You can play each level multiple times (which is what I have done) to be able to find all of the coins, gems and secret find. The graphics have that classic Nintendo colorful feel. It also makes great use of The Wii u game pad. You can use it to find extra coins and items. Also, there are levels where you are on a mining cart and you use the game pad to look at your surroundings from 360 degrees. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G

customer_reviews.title: Fun game with a pretty dull story.
customer_reviews.text: This game was super cute and very fun for awhile. The maps very quite a lot and get pretty hard later on into the game. However by the time you get into chapter three (seven-ish hours into the game) you feel like they could have tried a little something different with the story, since it just keeps repeating. Overall a fun game, worth renting, getting on sale or borrowing from a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Time for Adventure!
customer_reviews.text: Me, at the end of every level: "OMG, can this get any more adorable?!" Me, at the beginning of every new level: "OMG, it CAN get more adorable!!" This game is gorgeous to look at and is so cute that you'll hardly be able to stand it. The puzzles are well-designed and fun to play through many times in a row. It's easy enough for little kids to pick up, but is still fun for a grown-up Mario fan like me to keep playing. It may be a little short, but it's super charming and fun.
customer_reviews.author: SlowOctopus

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright my daughter didn’t like it at all but maybe her brother would once he’s grown I guess lol
customer_reviews.author: Nada

customer_reviews.title: Got it was on sale there was no scratches
customer_reviews.text: Is a good thing about this while I was on sale there was no scratches on the disc I'm sure my son will love it
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole Family!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game for anyone and everyone in the family! Captain Toad, the plodding adventurer, is great fun - puzzling out where the prizes are in short adventures that have layers of difficulty appropriate to various gamers! I'm not nearly done with the game - and it integrates with Mario 3D World to unlock special areas and play parts of 3D World as Toad. My entire family is absolutely loving this game! it's just FUN!
customer_reviews.author: John Pyers

customer_reviews.title: Not very challenging for children
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son beat the entire game in 2 days of playing for about 30 minutes each day... I'm glad this game didn't cost a lot of money on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: thejoysofraisingboys

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game if you like puzzles and figuring them out. Great game for kids or any Super Mario enthusiast. There are a lot of levels and they are all different and challenging. I would defiantly buy this again or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: HNNNNNGHHHH. ADORABLE.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS GAME! I preordered it and it came the day of release, and I wasted no time playing it. I actually haven't finished it yet, but this game is super cute! The puzzles are great, some of the music is remixed from Super Mario 3D World (where this game originated from), and overall it's just great! The only drawback is that it's one save file, so if you want to start a new game you'd have to erase the data in this one.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: A rare win for Nintendo these days
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how much content was in the game and how clever the puzzles were. I assumed it would be a kids' game- and I think a kid could probably handle it- but it was definitely more appreciated by my 30 year old friends and I. Excellent game for puzzle fans and completionists. I don't want to ruin anything, but when you think it's over, you've only reached the beginning :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: So fun. I love this style of action adventure puzzle ...
customer_reviews.text: About time Nintendo brought out an all-new kind of gameplay for a character, and with this, they nailed it! So fun. I love this style of action adventure puzzle solving, with the new unique manipulatable, diorama-like environments. The graphics are amazing also. Just a very fun game to go through and complete!
customer_reviews.author: BAKlineRMR

customer_reviews.title: Toadstool is cool!
customer_reviews.text: My elementary school-age daughters love this game! First levels establish the gameplay where you discover various objects by manipulating a 3D 'rubix cube' environment. Rotating levels allow you to see them from different angles while navigating obstacles. The seemingly simple premise gets increasingly difficult- fast! Pairing w/Toad amiibo adds another 'hide-and-seek' element.
customer_reviews.author: PickyPeeps

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the Wii U library
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to the Wii U library. Very intuitive techniques are used in this game since you need to use the gamepad as a means to rotate the camera as well as give you a unique look at what's around you. Serves very well as a puzzle game and you will find it gives a good level of challenge. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: majario

customer_reviews.title: Game is pretty clever and fun
customer_reviews.text: Game is pretty clever and fun, the level design is perfect. They throw some curveballs at you quite often.. My fiancée is loving this game right now. Nintendo is the only console marketed as a family oriented product but I hear more swear words every time the fiancée and the kids get into a new Nintendo title.
customer_reviews.author: xeidog

customer_reviews.title: Awful game
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is actually great. but would I recommend this game for anyone over the mental age of 13?... no.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't works with a UK Wii U console!! ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't works with a UK Wii U console !!! had it as a gift for my kids but it is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: A. Alshareedah

customer_reviews.title: I really love puzzle type games like this
customer_reviews.text: I really love puzzle type games like this. Even better is it gives you a bit of a break with all the games these days that require you to get weapons and such to kill all the enemies, this game is more of a "dodging enemies" game. Nice to have a little different style of gameplay than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Wadev3

customer_reviews.title: A delight for your gaming senses!
customer_reviews.text: This game has the charm of a Pixar movie that you can control and immerse yourself in, and it looks almost as good as one on theater on my HDTV at home, too! The colors, textures, and graphics are so delightful. Captain Toad himself is so charming and cute. I kept having a huge grin on my face as I tore through these puzzles and explore the gorgeous diorama levels like no other.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: This game is adorable, challenging
customer_reviews.text: This game is adorable, challenging, and incredibly fun. It took what Super Mario 3D World tried to do with Captain Toad, and went all-out on it. The plot is borderline non-existent, but if you're in for great 3D look-at-everything-three-hundred-times, then this game is a great little gem. Pun intended!
customer_reviews.author: Photobum

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun. It's cute, colorful and at times challenging. Very innovative and a great solo title for one of games oldest console characters. Toad finally gets his shot at stardom and this game doesn't disappoint. Fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Children's gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a six-year-old. He absolutely loves it! He has been smiling ever since opening this game for children. Cannot give a really good review about the product because as I said it was a gift. Received it in a timely fashion and was in perfect condition. Thumbs up from the child!

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo made a great game!
customer_reviews.text: I love puzzle games! Using toad as the main character seemed like a great idea, because it made the game challenging and fun. Good buy when I got it at $40. Replayability is great too with road amiibo and time challenges

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Puzzle game.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Lots of fun puzzles. While Toad can't jump, writers gave him lots of other things to do (like throwing, running, breaking stuff, beat a dragon). Recommend with Toad Amibo because it unlocks hide n seek mode. Other amibos give lives.

customer_reviews.text: One player game. My 6 year old loves it. Toad is her favorite character. Kind of challenging for her though but playable.

product_meta.title: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo Wii U| Edition:StandardCAPTAIN TOAD STARS IN HIS OWN QUEST THROUGH MAZE-LIKE MINI-UNIVERSES--ONLY ON WII U. EACH LITTLE WORLD CAPTAIN TOAD VISITS IS A UNIQUE MICROCOSM FILLED WITH TRICKS TO SOLVE, TR APS TO AVOID AND TREASURE TO FIND. TWIST THE CAMERA TO TRACK AN D DODGE ENEMIES. STAGES ARE FILLED WITH PUZZLING PLATFORMS
feature_bullets: Crafty treasure-tracker Captain Toad is on his very own puzzling adventure.
Each world is a maze, full of tricks, traps, treasures, and other surprises!
Unearth secrets and collect goodies by viewing worlds from every-which-way.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars522 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
